duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide excellent customer service, communication, and time management skills in a front desk role.
Monitor Emergency Response System and respond to emergency situations efficiently.
Greet and direct residents, guests, and invitees, and control access to the building.
Maintain daily logs, records, and forms, and resolve complaints/issues.
Follow safety procedures to maintain a safe and secure environment.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalency preferred. College level courses in business or hospitality are a plus.
